name: Interceptor
storyline:
Rebellious and degenerate cyborgs took over a server infrastructure and cut off power supply on an insignificant planet. The Baron, in control of this area, sends an Interceptor to restore order. The sentinel does not expect the robots to hide a secret affecting the fate of the whole planetary system. As time passes, the distinction between good and evil fades. The player's task is to restore order eliminating rebels and their leaders.

The rulers of the planetary system try to maintain peace and suppress the first symptoms of smoldering disturbances. But on one of the minor colonized planets, a rebellion ignites. The Barons cannot let the fragile peace of The Union collapse and allow the return of the conflagration of war.
In the system, Interceptors are the law. It is their duty to ensure that the rule of law is always upheld.
They exist to prevent another war. Despite the fact that they had previously fought on the other side of the barricade, they were able to unite. Even Barons take their strength into account.
summary: Take part in an atmospheric sci-fi horror game and stay alive in the last stronghold, the Cathedral. Arise, develop your character, gear up, fight soulless enemies and face the mighty Baron.
